GE07bhg4c05u:2: saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi |
GE07bhg4c05u:3: yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam ||1||
GE07bhg4c05u:6: jitendriyasya ca yateḥ pañcame muktim abravīt ||
GE07bhg4c05u:7: ajñāna-sambhūtaṃ saṃśayaṃ jñānāsinā chittvā karma-yogam ātiṣṭha ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c05u:8: tatra pūrvāpara-virodhaṃ manvāno 'rjuna uvāca saṃnyāsam iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:9: yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ity ādinā sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha ity ādinā ca karma-saṃnyāsaṃ kathayasi |
GE07bhg4c05u:10: jñānāsinā saṃśayaṃ chittvā yogam ātiṣṭha iti punar yogaṃ ca kathayasi |
GE07bhg4c05u:11: na ca karma-saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś ca ekasyaiva ekadaiva sambhavataḥ viruddha-svarūpatvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:12: tasmād etayor madhya ekasminn anuṣṭhātavye sati mama yac chreyaḥ suniścitam tad ekaṃ brūhi ||1||
GE07bhg4c05u:16_0: tṛtīye 'dhyāye jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te ity ādinārjunena pṛṣṭo bhagavān jñāna-karmaṇor
GE07bhg4c05u:16_2: proktā mayānagha ity ādinā nirṇayaṃ kṛtavān |
GE07bhg4c05u:17: tathā cājñādhikārikaṃ karma na jñānena saha samuccīyate tejas-timirayor iva yugapad asambhavāt karmādhikāra-hetu-bheda-buddhy-apanodakatvena jñānasya tad-virodhitvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:19: jñāna-kāryasyājñāna-nāśasya karmaṇā kartum aśakyatvāt tam eva viditvāpi mṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'nāyanāya iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:20: jñāne jāte tu karma-kāryaṃ nāpekṣyata evety uktaṃ yāvān artha udapāne ity atra |
GE07bhg4c05u:21: tathā ca jñāninaḥ karmānadhikāre niścite prārabdha-karma-vaśād vṛthā-ceṣṭā-rūpeṇa tad-anuṣṭhānaṃ vā sarva-karma-saṃnyāso veti nirvivādaṃ caturthe nirṇītam |
GE07bhg4c05u:22: ajñena tv antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-dvārā jñānotpattaye karmāṇy anuṣṭheyāni tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:23: sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate iti bhagavad-vacanāc ca |
GE07bhg4c05u:25: tathā sarva-karma-saṃnyāso 'pi jñānārthaḥ śrūyate etam eva pravrājino lokam icchantaḥ pravrajanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:26: śānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyet,
GE07bhg4c05u:27: tyajataiva hi taj jñeyaṃ tyuktuḥ pratyak paraṃ padam,
GE07bhg4c05u:29: vedān imaṃ lokam amuṃ ca parityajyātmānam anvicchet ity ādau |
GE07bhg4c05u:30: tatra karma tat-tyāgayor ārād upakāraka-saṃnipatyopakārakayoḥ prayājāvaghātayor iva na samuccayaḥ sambhavati viruddhatvena yaugapadyābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:31: nāpi karma-tat-tyāgayor ātma-jñāna-mātra-phalatvenaikārthatvād atirātrayoḥ ṣoḍaśi-grahaṇāgrahaṇayor iva vikalpaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:33: karmaṇo hi pāpa-kṣaya-rūpam adṛṣṭam eva dvāraṃ,
GE07bhg4c05u:34: saṃnyāsasya tu sarva-vikṣepābhāvena vicārāvasara-dāna-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭam eva dvāram |
GE07bhg4c05u:35: niyamāpūrvaṃ tu dṛṣṭa-samavāyitvād avaghātādāv iva na prayojakam |
GE07bhg4c05u:36: tathā cādṛṣṭārtha-dṛṣṭārthayor ārād upakāraka-saṃnipātyopakārakayor eka-pradhānārthatve 'pi vikalpo nāsty eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:42_0: tasmād ādau bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhānād antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhau tīvreṇa
GE07bhg4c05u:43: tathā coktam - na karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyaṃ puruṣo 'śnute iti | vakṣyate ca -
GE07bhg4c05u:44: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:45: yogārūḍhasya tasyaiva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate || [Gītā 6.3] iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:46: yogo 'tra tīvra-vairāgya-pūrvikā vividiṣā | tad uktaṃ vārtika-kāraiḥ -
GE07bhg4c05u:48: brahmāvāptyai tu tat-tyāga īpsantīti śruter balāt || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:50: kaṣāya-paṅktiḥ karmāṇi jñānaṃ tu paramā gatiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:51: kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakve tato jñānaṃ pravartate || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:53: kaṣāyaṃ pācayitvā ca śreṇī-sthāneṣu ca triṣu |
GE07bhg4c05u:54: pravrajec ca paraṃ sthānaṃ pārivrājyam anuttamam ||
GE07bhg4c05u:57: tam āsādya tu muktasya dṛṣṭārthasya vipaścitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:58: triṣv āśrameṣu ko nv artho bhavet paramābhīpsitaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:61_0: tathā ca śrutiḥ - brahmacaryaṃ samāpya gṛhī bhaved gṛhād vanī bhūtvā pravrajed yadi
GE07bhg4c05u:61_1: vetarathā brahmacaryād eva pravrajed gṛhād vā vanād vā yad ahar eva virajet tad ahar eva pravrajet iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:63: tasyaiva viraktatā-daśāyāṃ saṃnyāsaḥ śravaṇādy-avasara-dānena jñānārthaṃ iti daśā-bhedenājñam adhikṛtyaiva karma-tat-tyāgau vyākhyātuṃ pañcama-ṣaṣṭhāv adhyāyāv ārabhyete |
GE07bhg4c05u:64: vidvat-saṃnyāsas tu jñāna-balād artha-siddha eveti sandehābhāvān na vicāryate |
GE07bhg4c05u:65_0: tatraikam eva jijñāsum ajñaṃ prati jñānārthatvena karma-tat-tyāgayor vigdhānāt tayoś
GE07bhg4c05u:65_1: ca viruddhayor yugapad anuṣṭhānāsambhavān mayā jijñāsunā kim idānīm anuṣṭheyam iti
GE07bhg4c05u:67_0: karmaṇāṃ yāvaj-jīvādi-śruti-vihitānāṃ nityānāṃ naimittikānāṃ ca saṃnyāsaṃ tyāgaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:67_1: jijñāsum ajñaṃ prati kathayasi veda-mukhena punas tad-viruddhaṃ yogaṃ ca karmānuṣṭhāna-rūpaṃ śaṃsasi |
GE07bhg4c05u:68: etam eva pravrājino lokam icchantaḥ pravrajanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:69: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena ity ādi-vākya-dvayena -
GE07bhg4c05u:71: śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvann āpnoti kilbiṣam || [Gītā 4.21]
GE07bhg4c05u:72: chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata iti gītā-vākya-dvayena vā |
GE07bhg4c05u:73_0: tatraikam ajñaṃ prati karma-tat-tyāgayor vidhānād yugapad ubhayānuṣṭhānasambhavād
GE07bhg4c05u:73_1: etayoḥ karma-tat-tyāgayor madhye yad ekaṃ śreyaḥ praśasyataraṃ manyase karma vā tat-tyāgaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:73_2: vā tan me brūhi suniścitaṃ tava matam anuṣṭhānāya ||1 ||
GE07bhg4c05u:75: proktaṃ jñānād api śreṣṭhaṃ karma tad-dāṛḍhya-siddhaye |
GE07bhg4c05u:76: tat-padārthasya ca jñānaṃ sāmyād yā api pañcame ||
GE07bhg4c05u:77: pūrvādhyāyānte śrutena vākya-dvāreṇa virodham āśaṅkamānaḥ pṛcchati sannyāsam iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:80: iti vākyena tvaṃ karma-yogenotpanna-jñānasya karma-saṃnyāsaṃ brūṣe |
GE07bhg4c05u:83: ity anena punas tasyaiva karma-yogaṃ ca brūṣe |
GE07bhg4c05u:84: na ca karma-saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś ca ekasyaiva ekadaiva sambhavataḥ,
GE07bhg4c05u:86: tasmāj jñānī karma-saṃnyāsaṃ kuryāt, karma-yogaṃ vā kuryād iti tvad-abhiprāyam anavagato |
GE07bhg4c05u:87: haṃ pṛcchāmi etayor madhye yad ekaṃ śreyas tvayā suniścitam tan me brūhi ||1||
GE07bhg4c05u:90: śuddhasya tad-akartṛtvaṃ tvety ādi prāha pañcame ||
GE07bhg4c05u:91: dvitīye mumukṣuṃ praty ātma-vijñānaṃ mocakam abhidhāya tad-upāyayā niṣkāmaṃ karma kartavyam abhyadhāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:92: labdha-vijñānasya na kiṃcit karmāstīti yas tv ātma-ratir eva syāt iti tṛtīye,
GE07bhg4c05u:93: sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha iti caturthe cāvādīt |
GE07bhg4c05u:94: ante tu tasmād ajñāna-saṃbhūtaṃ [Gītā 4.42] ity ādinā tasyaiva punaḥ karma-yogaṃ prāvocat |
GE07bhg4c05u:96: he kṛṣṇa ! karmaṇāṃ sannyāsaṃ sarvendriya-vyāpāra-virati-rūpaṃ jñāna-yogam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:97: punar yogaṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ ca sarvendriya-vyāpāra-rūpaṃ śaṃsasi |
GE07bhg4c05u:98: na caikasya yugapat tau sambhavetāṃ, sthiti-gativat tamas-tejovac ca viruddha-svarūpatvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:99: tasmāl labdha-jñānaḥ karma sannyased anutiṣṭhed veti bhavad-abhimataṃ vettum aśakto 'haṃ pṛcchāmi |
GE07bhg4c05u:107: śrīdharaḥ : atrottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:108: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - na hi vedānta-vedyātma-tattvajñaṃ prati karma-yogam ahaṃ bravīmi |
GE07bhg4c05u:110: api tu dehātmābhimāninaṃ tvāṃ bandhu-vadhādi-nimitta-śoka-mohādi-kṛtam enaṃ saṃśayaṃ dehātma-viveka-jñānāsinā chittvā paramātma-jñānopāya-bhūtaṃ karma-yogam ātiṣṭheti bravīmi |
GE07bhg4c05u:111: karma-yogena śuddha-cittasyātma-tattva-jñāne jāte sati tat-paripākārthaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṅgatvena saṃnyāsaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:112: evaṃ saty aṅga-pradhānayor vikalpa-yogāt saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś cety etāv ubhāv api bhūmikā-bhedena samuccitāv eva niḥśreyasaṃ sādhayataḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:113: tathāpi tu tayor madhye tu karma-saṃnyāsāt sakāśāt karma-yogo viśiṣṭo bhavatīti ||2||
GE07bhg4c05u:114: madhusūdanaḥ : evam arjunasya praśne tad-uttaram śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:116: tayos tu karma-saṃnyāsād anadhikāri-kṛtāt karma-yogo viśiṣyate śreyān adhikāra-sampādakatvena ||2||
GE07bhg4c05u:117: viśvanāthaḥ : karma-yogo viśiṣyata iti jñāninaḥ karma-karaṇe na ko 'pi doṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:118: pratyuta niṣkāma-karmaṇā citta-śuddhi-dārḍhyāj jñāna-dārḍhyam eva syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:119: saṃnyāsinas tu kadācit citta-vaiguṇye sati tad-upaśamanārthaṃ kiṃ karma niṣiddham ?
GE07bhg4c05u:121: viṣaya-grahaṇe tu vāntāśitvam eva syād iti bhāvaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c05u:122: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:125: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - na khalu labdha-jñānasyāpi karma-yogo doṣāvahaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:127: jñāna-niṣṭhatayā karma-sannyāsinas tu citta-doṣe sati tad-doṣa-vināśāya karmānuṣṭheyaṃ pratiṣedhaka-śāstrāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:128: karma-tyāga-vākyāni tv ātmani ratau satyāṃ karmāṇi taṃ svayaṃ tjayantīty āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:129: tasmāt sukaratvād apramādatvāj jñāna-garbhatvāc ca karma-yogaḥ śreyān iti ||2||
GE07bhg4c05u:132: jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati |
GE07bhg4c05u:133: nirdvandvo hi mahā-bāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate ||3||
GE07bhg4c05u:135: kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ saṃnyāsitvena karma-yoginaṃ stuvaṃs tasya śreṣṭhatvaṃ darśayati jñeya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:136: rāga-dveṣādi-rāhityena parameśvarārthaṃ karmāṇi yo 'nutiṣṭhati sa nityaṃ karmānuṣṭhāna-kāle 'pi saṃnyāsīty evaṃ jñeyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:137: tatra hetuḥ nirdvandvo rāga-dveṣādi-dvandva-śūnyo hi śuddha-citto jñāna-dvārā sukham anāyāsenaiva bandhāt saṃsārāt pramucyate ||3||
GE07bhg4c05u:138: madhusūdanaḥ : tam eva karma-yogaṃ stauti jñeya iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:139: sa karmaṇi pravṛtto 'pi nityaṃ saṃnyāsīti jñeyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:140: ko 'sau ? yo na dveṣṭi bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kriyamāṇaṃ karma niṣphalatva-śaṅkayā |
GE07bhg4c05u:142_0: nirdvandvo rāga-dveṣa-rahito hi yasmāt sukham anāyāsena he mahābāho bandhād antaḥkaraṇāśuddhi-rūpāj
GE07bhg4c05u:144: na ca sannyāsa-prāpyo mokṣo 'kṛta-saṃnyāsenaiva tena na prāpya iti vācyam ity āha jñeya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:145: sa tu śuddha-cittaḥ karmī nitya-saṃnyāsī eva jñeyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:146: he mahābāho iti mukti-nagarīṃ jetuṃ sa eva mahāvīra iti bhāvaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c05u:147: baladevaḥ : kuto viśiṣyate tatrāha jñeya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:150: yaḥ karmāntargatātmānubhavānanda-paritṛptas tato 'nyat kiṃcit na kāṅkṣati na ca dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c05u:151: nirdvandvo dvandva-sahiṣṇuḥ sukham anāyāsena sukara-karma-niṣṭhayety arthaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c05u:154: sāṃkhya-yogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:155: ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate phalam ||4||
GE07bhg4c05u:156: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evam aṅga-pradhānatvenobhayor avasthā-bhedena krama-samuccayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:157: ato vikalpam aṅgīkṛtyobhayoḥ kaḥ śreṣṭha iti praśno 'jñāninām evocitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:158: na vivekinām ity āha sāṅkhya-yogāv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:160: saṃnyāsa-karma-yogau eka-phalau santau pṛthak svatantrāv iti bālā ajñā eva pravadanti na tu paṇḍitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:161: tatra hetuḥ - anayor ekam apy samyag āsthita āśritavān ubhayor api phalam āpnoti |
GE07bhg4c05u:162: tathā hi karma-yogaṃ samyag anutiṣṭhan śuddha-cittaḥ san jñāna-dvārā yad ubhayoḥ phalaṃ kaivalyaṃ tad vindati |
GE07bhg4c05u:163: saṃnyāsaṃ samyag āsthito 'pi pūrvam anuṣṭhitasya karma-yogasyāpi paramparayā jñāna-dvārā yad ubhayoḥ phalaṃ kaivalyaṃ tad vindatīti na pṛthak phalatvam anayor ity arthaḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c05u:165: nanu yaḥ karmaṇi pravṛttaḥ sa kathaṃ saṃnyāsīti jñātavyaḥ karma-tat-tyāgayoḥ svarūpa-virodhāt phalaikyāt tatheti cet, na |
GE07bhg4c05u:167: tathā ca niḥśreyasa-karāv ubhāv ity anupapannam ity āśaṅkyāha sāṃkhya-yogāv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:168: saṃkhyā samyag ātma-buddhis tāṃ vahatīti jñānāntaraṅga-sādhanatayā sāṅkhyaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:170: tau pṛthag viruddha-phalau bālāḥ śāstrārtha-viveka-jñāna-śūnyāḥ pravadanti, na paṇḍitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:172_0: ucyate - ekam apy saṃnyāsa-karmaṇor madhye samyag āsthitaḥ svādhikārānurūpeṇa samyag
GE07bhg4c05u:172_1: yathā-śāstraṃ kṛtavān sann ubhayor vindate phalam jñānotpatti-dvāreṇa niḥśreyasam ekam eva ||4 ||
GE07bhg4c05u:173: viśvanāthaḥ : tasmād yac chreya evaitayor iti tvad-uktam api vastuto na ghaṭate |
GE07bhg4c05u:174: vivekibhir ubhayoḥ pārthakyābhāvasya dṛṣṭatvād ity āha sāṃkhya-yogāv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:176: saṃnyāsa-karma-yogau pṛthak svatantrāv iti bālāḥ vadanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:177: na tu vijñāḥ jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī iti pūrvokteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:179: baladevaḥ : yaḥ śreya etayor ekam iti tvad-vākyaṃ ca na ghaṭata ity āha sāṃkhyeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:180: jñāna-yoga-karma-yogau phala-bhedāt pṛthag-bhūtāv iti bālāḥ pravadanti, na tu paṇḍitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:181: ataeva ekam ity ādi phalam ātmāvaloka-lakṣaṇam ||4||
GE07bhg4c05u:184: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:185: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ||5||
GE07bhg4c05u:186: śrīdharaḥ : etad eva sphuṭayati yat sāṃkhyair iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:187: sāṃkhyair jñāna-niṣṭhaiḥ saṃnyāsibhir yat sthānaṃ mokṣākhyaṃ prakarṣeṇa sākṣād avāpyate,
GE07bhg4c05u:188: yogair ity ārśa āditvān matv-arthīyo 'c-pratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:189: tena karma-yogibhir api tad eva jñāna-dvāreṇa gamyate 'vāpyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:190: ataḥ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca ekaphalatvena ekaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa eva samyak paśyati ||5||
GE07bhg4c05u:191: madhusūdanaḥ : ekasyānuṣṭhānāt katham ubhayoḥ phalaṃ vindate tathāha yat sāṃkhyair iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:192_1: eva saṃskṛtāntaḥ-karaṇaiḥ śravaṇādi-pūrvikayā jñāna-niṣṭhayā yat prasiddhaṃ sthānaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:192_2: tiṣṭhaty evāsmin na tu kadāpi cyavata iti vyutpattyā mokṣākhyaṃ prāpyata āvaraṇābhāva-mātreṇa
GE07bhg4c05u:193: yogair api bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā phalābhisandhi-rāhityena kṛtāni karmāṇi śāstrīyāṇi yogās te yeṣāṃ santi te 'pi yogāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:195: tair yogibhir api sattva-śuddhyā saṃhyāsa-pūrvaka-śravaṇādi-puraḥ-sarayā jñāna-niṣṭhayā vartamāne bhaviṣyati vā janmani sampatsyamānayā tat sthānaṃ gamyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:197: sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa eva samyak paśyati nānyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:198: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ yeṣāṃ saṃnyāsa-pūrvikā jñāna-niṣṭhā dṛśyate teṣāṃ tayaiva liṅgena prāg-janmasu bhagavad-arpita-karma-niṣṭhānumīyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:200: yāny ato 'nyāni janmāni teṣu nūnaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet |
GE07bhg4c05u:201: yat kṛtyaṃ puruṣeṇeha nānyathā brahmaṇi sthitiḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:202: evaṃ yeṣāṃ bhagavad-arpita-karma-niṣṭhā dṛśyate teṣāṃ tayaiva liṅgena bhāvinī saṃnyāsa-pūrvajñāna-niṣṭhānumīyate sāmagryāḥ kāryāvyabhicāritvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:203: tasmād ajñena mumukṣuṇāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhaye prathamaṃ karma-yogo 'nuṣṭheyo na tu saṃnyāsaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:204: sa tu vairāgya-tīvratāyāṃ svayam eva bhaviṣyatīti ||5||
GE07bhg4c05u:205: viśvanāthaḥ : etad eva spaṣṭayati yad iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:208: ataeva tad dvayaṃ pṛthag-bhūtam api yo vivekenaikam eva paśyati sa paśyati,
GE07bhg4c05u:214: ataeva tad dvayaṃ nivṛtti-pravṛtti-rūpatayā bhinna-rūpam api phalaikyād ekaṃ yaḥ paśyati vetti,
GE07bhg4c05u:215: sa paśyati sa cakṣuṣmān paṇḍita ity arthaḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c05u:218: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:221: yadi karma-yogino 'py antataḥ saṃnyāsenaiva jñāna-nisṭhā tarhy ādita eva saṃnyāsaḥ kartuṃ yukta iti manvānaṃ praty āha saṃnyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:222: ayogataḥ karma-yogaṃ vinā saṃnyāso duḥkham āptum duḥkha-hetuḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:225: yoga-yuktas tu śuddha-cittatayā muniḥ saṃnyāsī bhūtvācireṇaiva brahmādhigacchati |
GE07bhg4c05u:227: ataś citta-śuddheḥ prāk karma-yoga eva saṃnyāsād viśiṣyata iti pūrvoktaṃ siddham |
GE07bhg4c05u:232: aśuddhāntaḥkaraṇenāpi saṃnyāsa eva prathamaṃ kuto na kriyate jñāna-niṣṭhā-hetutvena tasyāvaśakatvād iti cet tatrāha saṃnyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:233: ayogato yogam antaḥ-karaṇa-śodhakaṃ śāstrīyaṃ karmāntareṇa haṭhād eva yaḥ kṛtaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ sa tu duḥkham āptum eva bhavati,
GE07bhg4c05u:235: śodhake ca karmaṇy anadhikārāt karma-brahmobhaya-bhraṣṭatvena parama-saṅkaṭāpatteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:236_0: karma-yoga-yuktas tu śuddhāntaḥkaraṇatvān munir manana-śīlaḥ saṃnyāsī bhūtvā brahma
GE07bhg4c05u:236_1: satya-jñānādi-lakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ na cireṇa śīghram evādhigacchati sākṣātkaroti pratibandhakābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:239: na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati || [Gītā 3.4] iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:240: ata eka-phalatve 'pi karma-saṃnyāsāt karma-yogo viśiṣyata iti yat prāg uktaṃ tad upapannam ||6||
GE07bhg4c05u:242: kintu samyak-citta-śuddhim anirdhārayato jñāninaḥ saṃnyāso duḥkhadaḥ karma-yogas tu sukhada eveti pūrva-vyañjitam arthaṃ spaṣṭam evāha saṃnyāsas tv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:244: ayogataḥ karma-yogābhāvāc citta-vaiguṇya-praśāmaka-karma-yogasya saṃnyāsiny abhāvāt tatra anadhikārād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:249: śrutir api -yadi na samuddharanti yatayo hṛdi kāma-jaṭā iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:250: bhagavatāpi yas tva saṃyata-ṣaḍ-vargaḥ [BhP 11.18.40] ity ādy uktam |
GE07bhg4c05u:251: tasmād yoga-yuktaḥ niṣkāma-karmavān munir jñānī san brahma śīghraṃ prāpnoti ||6||
GE07bhg4c05u:252: baladevaḥ : jñāna-yogasya duṣkaratvāt sukara-karma-yogaḥ śreyān ity āha saṃnyāsas tv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:254: ayogataḥ karma-yogaṃ vinā duḥkhaṃ prāptum bhavati |
GE07bhg4c05u:255: duṣkaratvāt sapramādatvāc ca duḥkha-hetur eva syād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:256: yoga-yukta-niṣkāma-karmī tu munir ātma-manana-śīlaḥ sann acireṇa śīghram eva brahmādhigacchati ||6||
GE07bhg4c05u:262: karma-yogādi-krameṇa brahmādhigame saty api tad-uparitanena karmaṇā bandhaḥ syād evety āśaṅkyāha yoga-yukta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:264: ataeva viśuddha ātmā cittaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:267: tataś ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūta ātmā yasya sa loka-saṅgrahārthaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vā karma kurvann api na lipyate ||7||
GE07bhg4c05u:269: nanu karmaṇo bandha-hetutvād yoga-yukto munir brahmādhigacchatīty anupapannam ity ata āha yoga-yukta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:271: tena yogena yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ prathamaṃ viśuddhātmā viśuddho rajas-tamo-bhyām akaluṣita ātmāntaḥkaraṇa-rūpaṃ sattvaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c05u:276: yasyaite nityatā daṇḍāḥ sa tridaṇḍīti kathyata || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:278: etādṛśasya tattva-jñānam avaśyaṃ bhavatīty āha sarva-bhūtātma-bhūtātmā sarva-bhūta ātma-bhūtaś cātmā svarūpaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c05u:279: jaḍājaḍātmakaṃ sarva ātma-mātraṃ paśyann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:280: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūta ātmā yasyeti vyākhyāne tu sarva-bhūtātmety etāvataivārtah-lābhād ātma-bhūtety adhikaṃ syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:282: etādṛśaḥ paramārtha-darśī kurvann api karmāṇi para-dṛṣṭyā na lipyate taiḥ karmabhiḥ sva-dṛṣṭyā tad-abhāvād ity arthaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c05u:283: viśvanāthaḥ : kṛtenāpi karmaṇā jñāninas tasya na lepa ity āha yogeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:284: yoga-yukto jñānī trividhaḥ - viśuddhātmā vijita-buddhir ekaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:288: etādṛśe gṛhasthe tu sarve 'pi jīvā anurajyantīty āha sarveṣām api bhūtānām ātma-bhūtaḥ premāspadībhūta ātmā deho yasya saḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c05u:289: baladevaḥ : īdṛśī mumukṣuḥ sarveṣāṃ preyān ity āha yogeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:294: ataeva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ jīvānām ātma-bhūtaḥ premāspadatām gata ātmā deho yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:295: na cātra pārtha-sārathinā sarvātmaikyam abhimatam - na tv evāham ity ādinā sarvātmanāṃ mitho bhedasya tenābhidhānāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:297: evambhūtaḥ kurvann api viviktātmānusandhānād anātmany ātmābhimānena na lipyate acireṇātmānam adhigacchati |
GE07bhg4c05u:301: naiva kiṃ cit karomīti yukto manyeta tattva-vit |
GE07bhg4c05u:302: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan ||8||
GE07bhg4c05u:303: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api |
GE07bhg4c05u:306: karma kurvann api na lipyata ity etad viruddham ity āśaṅkya kartṛtvābhimānābhāvān na viruddham ity āha naiveti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c05u:307_0: karma-yogena yuktaḥ krameṇa tattvavid bhūtvā darśana-śravaṇādīni kurvann apīndriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu
GE07bhg4c05u:307_1: vartanta iti dhārayan buddhyā niścinvan kiṃcid apy ahaṃ na karomīti manyeta manyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:316: etāni karmāṇi kurvann api abhimānābhāvād brahma-vin na lipyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:317: tathā ca parāmarṣaṃ sūtram - tad-adhigama uttara-pūrvāghayor aśleṣa-vināśau tad-vyapadeśād iti ||8-9||
GE07bhg4c05u:318: madhusūdanaḥ : etad eva vivṛṇoti naiveti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c05u:319_1: ca tat-tac-ceṣṭāsu kriyamāṇāsu indriyāṇīndriyādīny evendriyārtheṣu sva-sva-viṣayeṣu
GE07bhg4c05u:319_2: vartante pravartante na tv aham iti dhārayann avadhārayann naiva kiṃcit karomīti
GE07bhg4c05u:319_3: manyeta manyate tattvavit paramārtha-darśī yuktaḥ samāhita-cittaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:320: athavādau yuktaḥ karma-yogena paścād antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvāreṇa tattvavid bhūtvā naiva kiṃcit karomīti manyata iti sambandhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:321: tatra darśana-śravaṇa-sparśana-ghrāṇāśanāni cakṣuḥ-śrotra-tvag-ghrāṇa-rasanānāṃ pañca-jñānendriyāṇāṃ vyāpārāḥ paśyan śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnann ity uktāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:325: grahaṇaṃ hastayor iti pañca karmendriya-vyāpārā gacchan pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann ity uktāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:329: artha-krama-vaśāt pāṭha-kramaṃ bhaṅktvā vyākhyātāv imau ślokau |
GE07bhg4c05u:330: yasmāt sarva-vyāpāreṣv apy ātmano 'kartṛtvam eva paśyati |
GE07bhg4c05u:331: ataḥ kurvann api na lipyata iti yuktam evoktam iti bhāvaḥ ||8-9||
GE07bhg4c05u:332: viśvanāthaḥ : yena karmaṇālepas taṃ prakāraṃ śikṣayati naiveti |
GE07bhg4c05u:333: yuktaḥ karma-yogī darśanādīni kurvann apīndriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu vartanta iti dhārayan buddhyā niścinvan nirabhimānaḥ kiṃcid apy ahaṃ naiva karomīti manyate ||8-9||
GE07bhg4c05u:335_0: yukto niṣkāma-karmī prādhānika-dehendriyādi-saṃsargād darśanādīni karmāṇi kurvann
GE07bhg4c05u:335_1: api tattva-vit viviktam ātma-tattvam anubhavan indriyārtheṣu rūpādiṣu indriyāṇi cakṣur-ādīni
GE07bhg4c05u:335_2: mad-vāsanānuguṇa-paramātma-preritāni vartanta iti dhārayan niścinvann ahaṃ kiṃcid
GE07bhg4c05u:336: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnann iti cakṣuḥ-śrotra-tvag-ghrāṇa-rasanānāṃ jñānendriyāṇāṃ darśana-śravaṇa-sparśanāghrānāśanāni vyāpārāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:341: śvasann iti prāṇādīnām unmiṣan nimiṣann iti nāgādīnāṃ prāṇa-bhedānām |
GE07bhg4c05u:345: na tu svarūpaika-nimittam iti manyata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:346: na svarūpa-prayuktam ātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ kiṃcid api nāstīti śakyam abhidhātuṃ nirdhāraṇe manane ca tasyābhidhānāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:347: tat tac ca jñānam eva tac cātmano nityam |
GE07bhg4c05u:348: na hi vijñātur vijñāter viparilāpo vidyate iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:349: tat-siddhiś ca hariṇā dharma-bhūtena jñānena ca ity āhuḥ ||8-9||
GE07bhg4c05u:352: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:353: lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā ||10||
GE07bhg4c05u:354: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi yasya karomīti abhimāno 'sti tasya karma-lepo durvāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:355: tathāviśuddha-cittatvāt saṃnyāso 'pi nāsti iti mahat saṅkaṭam āpannam ity āśaṅkyāha brahmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c05u:358: yaḥ karmāṇi karoti asau pāpena bandhu-hetutayā pāpiṣṭhena puṇya-pāpātmakena karmaṇā na lipyate yathā padma-patram ambhasi sthitam api tenāmbhasā na lipyate tadvat ||10||
GE07bhg4c05u:360: tarhy avidvān kartṛtvābhimānāl lipyetaiva tathā ca karthaṃ tasya saṃnyāsa-pūrvikā jñāna-niṣṭhā syād iti tatrāha brahmaṇīti |
GE07bhg4c05u:361_0: brahmaṇi parameśvara ādhāya samarpya saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ tyaktveśvarārthaṃ bhṛtya
GE07bhg4c05u:361_1: iva svāmy-arthaṃ sva-phala-nirapekṣatayā karomīty abhiprāyeṇa karmāṇi laukikāni vaidikāni
GE07bhg4c05u:361_2: ca karoti yo lipyate na sa pāpena pāpa-puṇyātmakena karmaṇeti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c05u:362: yathā padma-patram upari prakṣiptenāmbhasā na lipyate tadvat |
GE07bhg4c05u:365: kiṃ ca brahmaṇi parameśvare mayi samarpya saṅgaṃ tyaktvā sābhimāno 'pi karmāsaktiṃ vihāya yaḥ karmāṇi karoti |
GE07bhg4c05u:370: tasmād etad brahma-nāma-rūpam annaṃ ca jñāyata iti śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:371: mama yonir mahad brahma iti vakṣyamāṇāc ca |
GE07bhg4c05u:372: dehendriyādīni pradhāna-pariṇāma-viśeṣāṇi bhavanti tad-rūpatayā pariṇate pradhāne darśanādīni karmāṇy ādhāya tasyaivaitāni |
GE07bhg4c05u:373: na tu tad-viviktasya śuddhasya mameti nirdhāryety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:375: yas tāni karoti sa tādṛg dehādimattayā sann api dehādy-ātmābhimānena pāpena na lipyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:377: na ca mayi saṃnyasya karmāṇi iti pūrva-svārasyād brahmaṇi paramātmanīti vyākhyeyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:382: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api |
GE07bhg4c05u:384: śrīdharaḥ : kevalaṃ sattva-śuddhi-mātra-phalam eva tasya karmaṇaḥ syāt yasmāt kāyeneti |
GE07bhg4c05u:386: yoginaḥ saṅgaṃ tyaktvā kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api |
GE07bhg4c05u:388: sarva-vyāpāreṣu mamatā-varjanāya yoginaḥ karmiṇaḥ karma kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:393: kāyena manasā buddhyendriyair api yoginaḥ karmiṇaḥ phala-saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karma kurvanti kāyādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ kevalair iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:394: īśvarāyaiva karomi na mama phalāyeti mamatā-śūnyair ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:397: indrāya svāhā ity ādinā havir-ādy-arpaṇa-kāle yadyapi manaḥ kvāpy anyatra tad apīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:399: baladevaḥ : sad-ācāraṃ pramāṇayann etad vivṛṇoti kāyeneti |
GE07bhg4c05u:400: kāyādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ karma kāyādy-ahaṃbhāva-śūnyā yoginaḥ kurvanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:405: yuktaḥ karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm |
GE07bhg4c05u:407: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kathaṃ tenaiva karmaṇā kaścin mucyate kaścid badhyate iti vyavasthā ?
GE07bhg4c05u:409: yuktaḥ parameśvaraika-niṣṭhaḥ san karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ tyaktvā karmaṇi kurvann ātyantikīṃ śāntiṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c05u:410: ayuktas tu bahirmukhaḥ kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ pravṛttyā phala āsakto nitarāṃ bandhaṃ prāpnoti ||12||
GE07bhg4c05u:412: kartṛtvābhimāna-sāmye 'pi tenaiva karmaṇā kaścin mucyate kaścit tu badhyata iti vaiṣamye ko hetur iti tatrāha yukta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:413_0: yukta īśvarāyaivaitāni karmāṇi na mama phalāyety evam abhiprāyavān karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā
GE07bhg4c05u:413_1: karmāṇi kurvan śāntim mokṣākhyām āpnoti naiṣṭhikīṃ sattva-śuddhi-nitya-vastu-viveka-saṃnyāsa-jñāna-niṣṭhā-krameṇa jātām iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c05u:414_0: yas tu punar ayukta īśvarāyaivaitāni karmāṇi na mama phalāyety abhiprāya-śūnyaḥ sa
GE07bhg4c05u:414_1: kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ pravṛttyā mama phalāyaivedaṃ karma karomīti phale sakto nibadhyate
GE07bhg4c05u:415: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvam api yuktaḥ san karmāṇi kurv iti vākya-śeṣaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c05u:417: karma-karaṇe anāsakty-āsaktī eva mokṣa-bandha-hetū ity āha yukto yogī niṣkāma-karmītity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:418: naiṣṭhikīm niṣṭhā-prāptāṃ śāntiṃ mokṣam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:422: yukta ātmārpita-manāḥ karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā kurvann naiṣṭhikīm sthirāṃ śāntim ātmāvaloka-lakṣaṇām āpnoti |
GE07bhg4c05u:423: ayukta ātmānarpita-manāḥ karma-phale saktaḥ kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ karmaṇi pravṛttyā nibadhyate saṃsarati ||12||
GE07bhg4c05u:427: nava-dvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan ||13||
GE07bhg4c05u:428: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ tāvac citta-śuddhi-śūnyasya saṃnyāsāt karma-yogo viśiṣyate ity etat prapañcitam |
GE07bhg4c05u:429: idānīṃ śuddha-cittasya saṃnyāsaḥ śreṣṭha ity āha sarva-karmāṇīti |
GE07bhg4c05u:431: sarvāṇi karmāṇi vikṣepakāni manasā viveka-yuktena saṃnyasya sukhaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhaḥ sann āste |
GE07bhg4c05u:432: kvāsta iti ? ata āha nava-dvāra iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:433: netre nāsike karṇau mukhaṃ ceti sapta śiro-gatāni |
GE07bhg4c05u:435: evaṃ nava-dvārāṇi yasmiṃs tasmin pure puravad ahaṅkāra-śūnye dehe dehy avatiṣṭhate |
GE07bhg4c05u:436: ahaṅkārābhāvād eva svyaṃ tena dehena naiva kurvan mama-kārābhāvāc ca na kārayan ity aviśuddha-cittād vyavṛttir uktā |
GE07bhg4c05u:437: aśuddha-citto hi saṃnyasya punaḥ karoti kārayati ca |
GE07bhg4c05u:441: aśuddha-cittasya kevalāt saṃnyāsāt karma-yogaḥ śreyān iti pūrvoktaṃ prapañcyādhunā śuddha-cittasya sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa eva śreyān ity āha sarva-karmāṇīti |
GE07bhg4c05u:442_0: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ ceti sarvāṇi karmāṇi manasā karmaṇy akarma
GE07bhg4c05u:442_1: yaḥ paśyed ity atroktenākartrātma-svarūpa-samyag-darśanena saṃnyasya parityajya prārabdha-karma-vaśād āste tiṣṭhaty eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:443: kiṃ duḥkhena nety āha sukham anāyāsena |
GE07bhg4c05u:445: kāya-vāṅ-manāṃsi svacchandāni kuto na vyāpriyante tatrāha vaśī sva-vaśīkṛta-kārya-karaṇa-saṅghātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:446: kvāste ? nava-dvāre pure dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve nāsike vāg eketi śirasi sapta |
GE07bhg4c05u:447: dve pāyūpasthākhye adha iti nava-dvāra-viśiṣṭe dehe |
GE07bhg4c05u:450: ajño hi dehatādātmyābhimānād deha eva na tu dehī |
GE07bhg4c05u:451: sa ca dehādhikaraṇam evātmano 'dhikaraṇaṃ manyamāno gṛhe bhūmāvasāne vāham āsa ity abhimanyate na tu dehe 'ham āsa iti bheda-darśanābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:452: saṃghāta-vyatiriktātma-darśī tu sarva-karma-saṃnyāsī bheda-darśanād dehe 'ham āsa iti pratipadyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:453: ataeva dehādi-vyāpārāṇām avidyayātmany akriye samāropitānāṃ vidyayā bādha eva sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:454: etasmād evājña-vailakṣaṇyādy-uktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ nava-dvāre pure āsta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:455_0: nanu dehādi-vyāpārāṇām ātmany āropitānāṃ nau-vyāpārāṇāṃ tīrastha-vṛkṣa iva vidyayā
GE07bhg4c05u:455_1: bādhe 'pi sva-vyāpāreṇātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ dehādi-vyāpāreṣu kārayitṛtvaṃ ca syād iti
GE07bhg4c05u:455_2: nety āha naiva kurvan na kārayan |
GE07bhg4c05u:458_0: ato 'nāsaktaḥ karmāṇi kurvann api jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī iti pūrvoktavad vastutaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:458_1: saṃnyāsī evocyate tatrāha sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasya kāyādi-vyāpāreṇa bahiḥ kurvann
GE07bhg4c05u:460: nava-dvāre pure ahaṃ-bhāva-śūnye dehe dehy utpanna-jñāno jīvo naiva kurvann iti karma-sukhasya vastutaḥ kartṛtvaṃ naivāstīti jānan,
GE07bhg4c05u:461: na kārayann iti nāpi teṣu prayojana-kartṛtvam ity api jānann ity arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c05u:463: vivekatā manasā tādṛśi pradhāne sarva-karmāṇi saṃnyasyārpayitvā dehādinā bahis tāni kurvann api vaśī jitendriyaḥ sukhaṃ āste |
GE07bhg4c05u:464_0: nava-dvāre pure puravad ahaṃ-bhāva-varjite dehe dve netre dve nāsike dve śrotre mukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:464_1: ceti śirasi sapta dvārāṇi adhastāt tu pāyūpasthākhye dve iti nava-dvārāṇi dehī labdha-jñānojīvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:465: naiveti dehādi-viviktasyātmanaḥ karmasu kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvaṃ ca nāstīti vijānann ity arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c05u:468: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:470: śrīdharaḥ : nanu eṣa hy evainaṃ sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate |
GE07bhg4c05u:471: eṣa asādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate ity-ādi-śruteḥ parameśvareṇaiva śubhāśubha-phaleṣu karmasu kartṛtvena prayujyamāno 'svatantraḥ puruṣaḥ kathaṃ tāni karmāṇi tyajet ?
GE07bhg4c05u:472: īśvareṇaiva jñāna-mārge prayujyamāṇaḥ śubhāśubhani ca tyakṣyatīti cet ?
GE07bhg4c05u:473: evaṃ sati vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇyābhyām īśvarasyāpi prayojaka-kartṛtvāt puṇya-pāpa-sambandhaḥ syād ity āśaṅkyāha na kartṛtvam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c05u:474: prabhur īśvaro jīva-lokasya kartṛtvādikaṃ na sṛjati,
GE07bhg4c05u:476: anādy-avidyā-kāma-vaśāt pravṛtti-svabhāvaṃ jīva-lokam īśvaraḥ karmasu niyuṅkte |
GE07bhg4c05u:477: na tu svayam eva kartṛtvādikam utpādayatīty arthaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c05u:479: devadattasya svagataiva gatir yathā sthitau satyāṃ na bhavati evam ātmano 'pi kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvam na svagatam eva sat-saṃnyāse sati na bhavati,
GE07bhg4c05u:480: athavā nabhasi tala-malinatādivad vastu-vṛttyā tatra nāsty eveti sandehāpohāyāha na kartṛtvam iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:481: lokasya dehādeḥ kartṛtvaṃ prabhur ātmā svāmī na sṛjati tvaṃ kurv iti niyogena tasya kārayitā na bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:482: nāpi lokasya karmāṇīpsitatamāni ghaṭādīni svayaṃ sṛjati kartāpi na bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:483: nāpi lokasya karma kṛtavatas tat-phala-sambandhaṃ sṛjati bhojayitāpi bhoktāpi na bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:484: na samānaḥ sann ubhau lokāv anusaṃcarati dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva sadhīḥ ity ādi śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:485: atrāpi śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate [Gītā 13.31] ity ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:486: yadi kiṃcid api svato na kārayati na karoti cātmā kas tarhi kārayan kurvaṃś ca pravartata iti tatrāha svabhāvas tv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:488: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu ca yadi jīvasya vastutaḥ kartṛtvādikaṃ naivāsti,
GE07bhg4c05u:489: tarhi parameśvara-sṛṣṭe jagati sarvatra jīvasya kartṛtva-bhokṛtvādi-darśanān manye parameśareṇaiva balāt tasya kartṛtvādikaṃ sṛṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c05u:490: tathā sati tasmin vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye prasakte, tatra na hi nahīty āha na kartṛtvam iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:492: na ca karma-phalair bhogaiḥ saṃyogam api,
GE07bhg4c05u:494: taṃ jīvaṃ kartṛtvādy-abhimānam ārohayitum iti bhāvaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c05u:495: baladevaḥ : etad dvayaṃ śuddhasya nāstīti viśadayati neti |
GE07bhg4c05u:496: prabhur dehendriyādīnāṃ svāmī jīvo lokasya janasya kartṛtvaṃ na sṛjatīti tvaṃ kurv iti kārayitā na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c05u:497: nāpi tasyepsitatamāni karmāṇi mālyāmbarādīni sṛjatīti svayaṃ kartāpi na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c05u:498: na ca karma-phalena sukhena duḥkhena ca saṃyogaṃ sambandhaṃ sṛjatīti bhojayitā bhoktā ca na bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:499: yady evaṃ, tarhi kaḥ kārayan kurvaṃś ca pratīyate ? tatrāha svabhāvas tv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:500: anādi-pravṛttā pradhāna-vāsanātra svabhāva-śabdenokta-prādhānika-dehādimān jīvaḥ kārayitā kartā ceti na viviktasya tattvam iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:501: śuddhe 'pi kiṃcit kartṛtvam asty eva pūrvatra sukhāsane tattvasyokteḥ bhānādāv ivaitad bodhyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c05u:506: nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:508: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evaṃ tasmāt nādatta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:509: prayojako 'pi san prabhuḥ kasyacit pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca naivādatte na bhajate |
GE07bhg4c05u:512: yadi hi svārtha-kāmanayā kārayet tarhi tathā syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:515: nanu bhaktān anugṛhṇato 'bhaktān nigṛhṇataś ca vaiṣamyopalambhāt katham āpta-kāmatvam iti ?
GE07bhg4c05u:518: evam ajñānena sarvatra samaḥ parameśvara ity evaṃbhūtaṃ jñānam āvṛtam |
GE07bhg4c05u:521: madhusūdanaḥ : nanv īśvaraḥ kārayitā jīvaḥ kartā,
GE07bhg4c05u:522: tathā ca śrutiḥ - eṣa u hy eva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam unninīyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:523: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate ity ādiḥ | smṛtiś ca -
GE07bhg4c05u:525: īśvara-prerito gacchet svargaṃ vāśvabhram eva ca || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:526: tathā ca jīveśvarayoḥ kartṛtva-kārayitṛtvābhyāṃ bhoktṛtva-bhojayitṛtvābhyāṃ ca pāpa-puṇya-lepa-sambhavāt katham uktaṃ svabhāvas tu pravartata iti tatrāha nādatta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:527: paramārthataḥ vibhuḥ parameśvaraḥ kasyacit jīvasya pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca naivādatte paramārthato jīvasya kartṛtvābhāvāt parameśvarasya ca kārayitṛtvābhāvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:528_0: kathaṃ tarhi śrutiḥ smṛtir loka-vyavahāraś ca tatrāha ajñānenāvaraṇa-vikṣepā-śaktimatā
GE07bhg4c05u:529: tena svarūpāvaraṇena muhyanti pramātṛ-prameya-pramāṇa-kartṛ-karma-karaṇa-bhoktṛ-bhogya-bhogākhya-nava-vidha-saṃsāra-rūpaṃ moham atasmiṃs tad-avabhāsa-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:530: vikṣepaṃ gacchanti jantavo janana-śīlāḥ saṃsāriṇo vastu-svarūpādarśinaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:532: tasyāṃ cāvasthāyāṃ mūḍha-pratyayānuvādinyāv ete śruti-smṛtī vāstavādvaita-bodhi-vākya-śeṣa-bhūte iti na doṣaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c05u:533: viśvanāthaḥ : yasmād asādhu-sādhu-karmaṇām īśvaro na kārayitā,
GE07bhg4c05u:534: tasmād eva na tasya pāpa-puṇya-bhāgitvam ity āha nādatta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:536: kintu tadīyā khalu yā śaktir avidyā saiva jīva-jñānam āvṛṇoti ity āha ajñānenāvidyayā |
GE07bhg4c05u:538: baladevaḥ : nanu yadi viśuddhasya jīvasya tādṛśa-karma-kartṛtvādi nāstīti brūṣe,
GE07bhg4c05u:539: tarhi kautukākrāntaḥ paramātmā pradhānaṃ tad-gale nipātya tat-pariṇāma-dehendriyādi-matas tasya tad-racitavān ity āpadyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:541: anyathā eṣa u hy eva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate |
GE07bhg4c05u:542: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate iti śrutiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:544: īśvara-prerito gacchet svargaṃ vāśv abhram eva ca ||
GE07bhg4c05u:547: prayojake tasmin vaiṣamyādikaṃ pāpādi-bhāgitvaṃ ca syād iti cet tatrāha nādatta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:548_2: jīvaṃ tad-vāsanānusāreṇa karmāṇi kārayan kasyacij jīvasya pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca nādatte na gṛhṇāti |
GE07bhg4c05u:554: audāsīnya-mātre 'yaṃ gandhādi-dṛṣṭānto na tv icchāyā abhāve tasyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:556: tarhi jīvās taṃ viṣamaṃ kuto vadanti, tatrāha ajñāneneti |
GE07bhg4c05u:557: anādi-tad-vaimukhyenājñānena jīvānāṃ nityam api jñānam āvṛtaṃ tirohitam |
GE07bhg4c05u:559: samam api taṃ vimūḍhā viṣamaṃ vadanti na vijñā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:560: āha caivaṃ sūtrakāraḥ - vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati [Vs 2.1.35],
GE07bhg4c05u:561: na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvāt [Vs 2.1.36] iti ||15||
GE07bhg4c05u:564: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:566: śrīdharaḥ : jñāninas tu na muhyantīty āha jñāneneti |
GE07bhg4c05u:567: bhagavato jñānena yeṣāṃ tad-vaiṣamyopalambhakam ajñānaṃ nāśitam taj jñānaṃ teṣām ajñānaṃ nāśayitvā tat paraṃ paripūrṇam īśvara-svarūpaṃ prakāśayati |
GE07bhg4c05u:568: yathādityas tamo nirasya samastaṃ vastu-jātaṃ prakāśayati tadvat ||16||
GE07bhg4c05u:569: madhusūdanaḥ : tarhi sarveṣām andādy-ajñānāvṛtatvāt kathaṃ saṃsāra-nivṛttiḥ syād ?
GE07bhg4c05u:571_4: nāśitaṃ bādhitaṃ kāla-traye 'py asad evāsattayā jñātam adhiṣṭhāna-caitanya-mātratāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:571_6: bhagavad-anugṛhītānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ teṣāṃ taj jñānaṃ kartṛ | ādityavad
GE07bhg4c05u:572_0: yathādityaḥ svodaya-mātreṇaiva tamo niravaśeṣaṃ nivartayati na tu kaṃcit sahāyam
GE07bhg4c05u:572_1: apekṣate tathā brahma-jñānam api śuddha-sattva-pariṇāmatvād vyāpaka-prakāśa-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:572_2: svotpatti-mātreṇaiva sahakāryantara-nirapekṣatayā sa-kāryam ajñānaṃ nivartayat param
GE07bhg4c05u:572_3: satya-jñānaānantānanda-rūpam ekam evādvitīyaṃ paramātma-tattvaṃ prakāśayati praticchāyā-grahaṇa-mātreṇaiva
GE07bhg4c05u:573: atrājñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānena nāśitam ity ajñānansyāvaraṇatva-jñāna-nāśyatvābhyāṃ jñānābhāva-rūpatvaṃ vyāvartitam |
GE07bhg4c05u:574: nahy abhāvaḥ kiṃcid āvṛṇoti na vā jñānābhāvo jñānena nāśyate svabhāvato nāśa-rūpatvāt tasya |
GE07bhg4c05u:575: tasmād aham ajño mām anyaṃ ca na jānāmīty ādi-sākṣi-pratyakṣa-siddhaṃ bhāva-rūpam evājñānam iti bhagavato matam |
GE07bhg4c05u:578_0: tathā ca śrutiḥ - tad yo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tad abhavat tatha rṣīṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:578_1: tathā manuṣyāṇāṃ tad idam apy etarhi ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati
GE07bhg4c05u:578_2: ity ādir yad viṣayaṃ yad-āśrayam ajñānaṃ tad-viṣaya-tad-āśraya-pramāṇa-jñānāt tan-nivṛttir
GE07bhg4c05u:579: tatrājñāna-gatam āvaraṇaṃ dvividham - ekaṃ sato 'py asattvāpādakam anyat tu bhāto 'py abhānāpādakam |
GE07bhg4c05u:581: anumite 'pi vahny-ādau parvate vahnir nāstīty ādi-bhramādarśanāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:582: tathā satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmāsti iti vākyāt parokṣa-niścaye 'pi brahma nāstīti bhramo nivartata eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:583: asty eva brahma kintu mama na bhātīty ekaṃ bhrama-janakaṃ dvitīyam abhānāvaraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:585: sa ca sākṣātkāro vedānta-vākyenaiva janyate nirvikalpaka ity ādy advaita-siddhāv anusandheyam ||16||
GE07bhg4c05u:587: tathaivāparā tasya vidyā-śaktir avidyāṃ vināśya jñānaṃ prakāśayatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:590: teṣāṃ jīvānāṃ jñānam eva kartṛ ādityavad ity-āditya-prabhā yathāndhakāraṃ vināśya ghaṭa-paṭādikaṃ prakāśayati,
GE07bhg4c05u:591: tathaiva vidyayaivāvidyāṃ vināśya taj-jīva-niṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ param aprākṛtaṃ prakāśayati |
GE07bhg4c05u:592: tena parameśvaro na kam api badhnāti, nāpi kam api mocayati |
GE07bhg4c05u:593: kintv ajñāna-jñāne prakṛter eva dharmaḥ krameṇa badhnāti mocayati ca |
GE07bhg4c05u:595: anāsakti-śāntyādayo mocakāś ca prakṛter eva dharmāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:596: kintu parameśvarasyāntaryāmitva eva prakṛtes te te dharmā udbudhyanta ity etad-aṃśenaiva tasya prayojakatvam iti na tasya vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye
GE07bhg4c05u:598: baladevaḥ : vijñā na muhyantīty etad āha jñāneneti |
GE07bhg4c05u:601_0: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ [Gītā 4.38] iti cokta-mahimnā sad-guru-prasāda-labdhena sva-parātma-viṣayakena
GE07bhg4c05u:601_1: jñānena yeṣāṃ sat-prasaṅgināṃ tad-vaimukhyam ajñānaṃ nāśitaṃ pradhvaṃsitaṃ teṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:602: dehādeḥ paraṃ jīvaṃ vaiṣamyādi-doṣāt param īśvaraṃ ca bodhayati |
GE07bhg4c05u:603: ādityavat yathā ravir udita eva tamo nirasyan yathāvad vastu pradarśayati,
GE07bhg4c05u:604: tathā sad-gurūpadeśa-labdham ātma-jñānaṃ yathāvad ātma-vastv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:605_0: atra vinaṣṭājñānānāṃ jīvānāṃ bahutvaṃ nigadatā pārtha-sārathinā mokṣe teṣāṃ tad-darśitaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:605_1: aupādhikatvaṃ tasya praty uktaṃ neme janādhipāḥ ity upakramoktaṃ ca tat sopapattikam abhūt ||16 ||
GE07bhg4c05u:610: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃbhūteśvaropāsakānāṃ phalam āha tad-buddhaya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:614: tad eva param ayamam āśrayo yeṣām |
GE07bhg4c05u:615: tataś ca tat-prasāda-labdhenātma-jñānena nirdhūtaṃ nirastaṃ kalmaṣaṃ yeṣām |
GE07bhg4c05u:617: madhusūdanaḥ : jñānena paramātma-tattva-prakāśe sati tad-buddhaya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:618_0: tasmin jñāna-prakāśite paramātma-tattve sac-cid-ānanda-ghana eva bāhya-sarva-viṣaya-parityāgena
GE07bhg4c05u:618_1: sādhana-paripākāt paryavasitā buddhir antaḥkaraṇa-vṛttiḥ sākṣātkāra-lakṣaṇā yeṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:618_2: te tad-buddhayaḥ sarvadā nirbīja-samādhi-bhāja ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:619: tat kiṃ boddhāro jīvā boddhavyaṃ brahma-tattvam iti boddhṛ-boddhavya-bhāvo hi māyā-vijṛmbhito na vāstavābheda-virodhīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:622: ajñā api hi vastu-gatyā tad-ātmāna iti kathaṃ tad-vyāvṛttir iti cet, na |
GE07bhg4c05u:624: ajñā hi anātma-bhūte dehādāv ātmābhimānina iti na tad-ātmāna iti vyapadiśyante |
GE07bhg4c05u:625: vijñās tu nivṛtta-dehādy-abhimānā iti virodhi-nivṛttyā tad-ātmāna iti vyapadiśyanta iti yuktaṃ viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c05u:626: nanu karmānuṣṭhāna-vikṣepe sati kathaṃ dehādy-abhimāna-nivṛttir iti tatrāha tan-niṣṭhā iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:627: tasminn eva brahmaṇi sarva-karmānuṣṭhāna-vikṣepa-nivṛttyā niṣṭhā sthitir yeṣāṃ te tan-niṣṭhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:629: phala-rāge sati kathaṃ tat-sādhana-bhūta-karma-tyāga iti tatrāha tat-parāyaṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:630: tad eva param ayanaṃ prāptavyaṃ yeṣāṃ te tat-parāyaṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:632: atra tad-buddhaya ity anena sākṣātkāra uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:634: tat-parāyaṇā ity anena vairāgya-prakarṣaṃ ity uttarottarasya pūrva-pūrva-hetutvaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:635: ukta-viśeṣaṇā yatayo gacchanty apunar-āvṛttiṃ punar-deha-sambandhābhāva-rūpāṃ muktiṃ prāpnuvanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:636_0: sakṛn muktānām api punar deha-sambandhaḥ kuto na syād iti tatrāha jñāna-nirdhūta-kalmaṣāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:636_1: jñānena nirdhūtaṃ samūlam unmūlitaṃ punar-deha-sambandha-kāraṇaṃ kalmaṣaṃ puṇya-pāpātmakaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:637: jñānenānādy-ajñāna-nivṛttyā tat-kārya-karma-kṣaye tan-mūlakaṃ punar deha-grahaṇaṃ kathaṃ bhaved iti bhāvaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c05u:638: viśvanāthaḥ : kintu vidyā jīvātma-jñānam eva prakāśayati,
GE07bhg4c05u:639: na tu paramātma-jñānaṃ bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ iti bhagavad-ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:640: tasmāt paramātma-jñānārthaṃ jñānibhir api punar viśeṣato bhaktiḥ kāryā ity ata āha tad-buddhaya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:642: tasmin parameśvara eva buddhir yeṣām te tam-manana-parā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:643: tad-ātmānas tan-manaskās tam eva dhyāyanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:644: tan-niṣṭhāḥ jñānaṃ mayi saṃnyaset iti bhagavad-ukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:647: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:648: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tad-anantaram || [Gītā 18.55] iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:649: jñāna-nirdhūta-kalmaṣā jñānena vidyāyaiva pūrvam eva dhvasta-samastāvidyāḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c05u:650: baladevaḥ : paramātmany avaiṣamyādi-dhyāyatāṃ phalam āha tad iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:651: tasmiṃs tad-avaiṣamyādike guṇa-gaṇe buddhir niścayātmikā yeṣāṃ te |
GE07bhg4c05u:652: tad-ātmānas tasmin niviṣṭa-manasaḥ tan-niṣṭhās tat-tātparyavantas tat-parāyaṇās tat-samāśrayāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:653: evam abhyastena tad-vaiṣamyādi-guṇa-jñānena nirdhūta-kalmaṣā vinaṣṭa-tad-vaimukhyāḥ santa apunar-āvṛttiṃ muktiṃ gacchantīti ||17||
GE07bhg4c05u:657: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ sama-darśinaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c05u:659: kīdṛśās te jñānino ye 'punar-āvṛttiṃ gacchantīty apekṣāyām āha vidyā-vinaya-saṃpanna iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:660: viṣameṣv api samaṃ brahmaiva draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te paṇḍitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:663: śuno yaḥ pacati tasmin śvapāke ca iti karmaṇā vaiṣamyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:664: gavi hastini śuni ceti jātito vaiṣamyaṃ darśitam ||18||
GE07bhg4c05u:666: deha-pātād ūrdhvaṃ videha-kaivalya-rūpaṃ jñāna-phalam uktvā prārabdha-karma-vaśāt saty api dehe jīvan-mukti-rūpaṃ tat-phalam āha vidyeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:669: tābhyāṃ saṃpanne brahma-vidi vinīte ca brāhmaṇe sāttvike sarvottame |
GE07bhg4c05u:671: tathā hastini śuni śvapāke cātyanta tāmase sarvādhame 'pi |
GE07bhg4c05u:672: sattvādi-guṇais taj-jaiś ca saṃskārair aspṛṣṭam eva samaṃ brahma draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te sama-darśinaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:674_0: yathā gaṅgā-toye taḍāge surāyāṃ mūtre vā pratibimbitasyādityasya na tad-guṇa-doṣa-sambandhas
GE07bhg4c05u:675: sarvatra sama-dṛṣṭyaiva rāga-dveṣa-rāhityena paramānanda-sphūrtyā jīvan-muktim anubhavantīty arthaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c05u:677: tataś ca guṇātītānāṃ teṣāṃ guṇa-maye vastu-mātra eva tāratamya-mayaṃ viśeṣam ajighṛkṣūṇāṃ sama-buddhir eva syād ity āha vidyeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:680: śuni ca śvapāke ceti tāmas-jātitvād adhame 'pi tat-tad-viśeṣāgrahaṇāt sama-darśinaḥ paṇḍitā guṇātītāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:684: tādṛśe brāhmaṇe śvapāke ceti karmaṇaitau viṣamau gavi hastini śuni ceti jātyaite viṣamāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:685: evaṃ viṣamatayā sṛṣṭeṣu brāhmaṇādiṣu ye paramātmānaṃ samaṃ paśyanti, ta eva paṇḍitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:686: tat-karmānusāriṇī tena teṣāṃ tathā tathā sṛṣṭiḥ,
GE07bhg4c05u:687: na tu rāga-dveṣānusāriṇīti parjanyavat sarvatra samaḥ paramātmeti ||18||
GE07bhg4c05u:690: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:691: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c05u:692: śrīdharaḥ : nanu viṣamesu sama-darśanaṃ niṣiddhaṃ kurvanto 'pi kathaṃ te paṇḍitāḥ ?
GE07bhg4c05u:693: yathāha gautamaḥ samāsam ābhyāṃ viṣama-same pūjātaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:694: asyārthaḥ samāya pūjayā viṣame prakāre kṛte sati viṣamāya ca same prakāre kṛte sati sa pūjaka iha lokāt para-lokāc ca hīyata iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:699: kaiḥ ? yeṣāṃ manaḥ sāmye samatve sthitaṃ |
GE07bhg4c05u:700: tatra hetuḥ -- hi yasmād brahma samaṃ nirdoṣaṃ ca tasmāt te sama-darśino brahmaṇy eva sthitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:702: gautamoktas tu doṣo brahma-bhāva-prāpteḥ pūrvam eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:705: nanu sāttvika-rājasa-tāmaseṣu svabhāva-viṣameṣu prāṇiṣu samatva-darśanaṃ dharma-śāstra-niṣiddham |
GE07bhg4c05u:706: tathā ca tasyānnam abhojyam ity upakramya gautamaḥ smarati samāsam ābhyāṃ viṣama-same pūjāta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:709_1: pūjā-viśesaḥ kriyate tat-samāyaivānyasmai caturveda-pāragāya sad-ācārāya viṣame tad-apekṣayā
GE07bhg4c05u:710_0: tathālpa-vedānāṃ hīnācārāṇāṃ yādṛśo hīna-sādhanaḥ pūjā-prakāraḥ kriyate tādṛśāyaivāsamāya
GE07bhg4c05u:712: uttamasya hīnatayā hīnasyottamatayā pūjāto hetos tasya pūjayitur annam abhojyaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:713: pūjayitā pratipatti-viśesam akurvan dhanād dharmāc ca hīyata iti ca doṣāntaram |
GE07bhg4c05u:714: yadyapi yatīnāṃ niṣparigrahāṇāṃ pākābhāvād dhanābhāvāc cābhojyānnatvaṃ dhana-hīnatvaṃ ca svata eva vidyate tathāpi dharma-hānir doso bhavaty eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:716: tapo-dhanānāṃ ca tapa eva dhanam iti tad-dhānir api dūṣaṇaṃ bhavaty eveti kathaṃ sama-darśinaḥ paṇḍitā jīvan-muktā iti prāpte pariharati ihaiveti |
GE07bhg4c05u:717: taiḥ sama-darśibhiḥ paṇḍitair ihaiva jīvana-daśāyām eva jito 'tikrāntaḥ sargaḥ sṛjyata iti vyutpattyā dvaita-prapañcaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:718: deha-pātād ūrdhvam atikramitavya iti kim u vaktavyam ?
GE07bhg4c05u:720: yeṣāṃ sāmye sarva-bhūteṣu viṣameṣv api vartamānasya brahmaṇaḥ sama-bhāve sthitaṃ niścalaṃ manaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:721: hi yasmān nirdoṣaṃ samaṃ sarva-vikāra-śūnyaṃ kūṭastha-nityam ekaṃ ca brahma tasmāt te brahmaṇy eva sthitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:723: duṣṭatvam hi dvedhā bhavati aduṣṭasyāpi duṣṭa-sambandhāt svato duṣṭatvād vā |
GE07bhg4c05u:726: tatra doṣavatsu śvapākādiṣu sthitaṃ doṣair duṣyati brahmeti mūḍhair vibhāvyamānam api sarva-doṣāsaṃsṛṣṭam eva brahma vyomavad asaṅgatvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:731: na lipyate loka-duḥkhena bāhyaḥ || iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:732: nāpi kāmādi-dharmavattayā svata eva kaluṣitaṃ kāmāder antaḥkaraṇa-dharmatvasya śruti-smṛti-siddhatvāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:733: tasmān nirdoṣa-brahma-rūpā yatayo jīvan-muktā abhojyānnādi-doṣa-duṣṭāś ceti vyāhṛtam |
GE07bhg4c05u:737: dhanād dharmāc ca hīyata ity upasaṃhārāc ceti draṣṭavyam ||19||
GE07bhg4c05u:739: ihaiva iha loka eva sṛjyata iti sargaḥ saṃsāro jitaḥ parābhūtaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c05u:741: iha sādhana-daśāyām eva taiḥ sargaḥ saṃsāro jitaḥ parābhūtaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:742: kaiḥ ? yeṣāṃ manaḥ sāmye 'vaiṣamyākhye brahma-dharme sthitaṃ niviṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c05u:744: hi yato brahmaṇy avaiṣamyādikaṃ niścikyus tasmāt prapañce tiṣṭhanto 'pi te brahmaṇy eva sthitāḥ muktis teṣāṃ sulabhety arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c05u:747: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:749: śrīdharaḥ : brahma-prāptasya lakṣaṇam āha na prahṛṣyed iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:750: brahma-vid bhūtvā brahmaṇy eva yaḥ sthitaḥ sa priyaṃ prāpya na prahṛṣyet prakṛṣṭa-harṣavān syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:751: apriyam prāpya ca nodvijet na viṣīdatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:752: yataḥ sthira-buddhir sthirā niścalā buddhir yasya |
GE07bhg4c05u:755: yasmān nirdoṣaṃ samaṃ brahma tasmāt tad-rūpam ātmānaṃ sākṣātkurvann āha na prahṛṣyed iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:756: duḥkheṣv anudvigna-manāḥ sukheṣu vigata-spṛhaḥ ity atra vyākhyātaṃ pūrvārdham |
GE07bhg4c05u:757: jīvan-muktānāṃ svābhāvikaṃ caritam eva mumukṣubhiḥ prayatna-pūrvakam anuṣṭheyam iti vadituṃ liṅga-pratyayau |
GE07bhg4c05u:758: advitīyātma-darśana-śīlasya vyatirikta-priyāpriya-prāpty-ayogyāc ca tan-nimittau harṣa-viṣādāv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:759_0: advitīyātma-darśanam eva vivṛṇoti - sthira-buddhiḥ sthirā niścalā saṃnyāsa-pūrvaka-vedānta-vākya-vicāra-paripākeṇa
GE07bhg4c05u:759_1: sarva-saṃśaya-śūnyatvena nirvicikitsā niścitā brahmaṇi buddhir yasya sa tathā labdha-śravaṇa-manana-phala iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c05u:760: etādṛśasya sarvāsaṃbhāvanā-śūnyatve 'pi viparīta-bhāva-pratibandhāt sākṣātkāro nodetīti nididhyāsanam āha - asaṃmūḍhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:763: tataś ca samādhi-paripākeṇa nirdoṣe same brahmaṇy eva sthito nānyatreti brahmaṇi sthito jīvan-muktaḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:764: etādṛśasya dvaita-darśanābhāvāt praharṣodvegau na bhavata ity ucitam eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:767: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ laukika-priyāpriyādiṣv api teṣāṃ sāmyam āha na prahṛṣyed iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:770: sādhana-daśāyām evam abhyased iti vivakṣayā vā liṅ |
GE07bhg4c05u:772: baladevaḥ : brahmaṇi sthitasya lakṣaṇam āha neti |
GE07bhg4c05u:773: vartamāne dehe sthitaḥ prārabdhākṛṣṭaṃ priyam apriyaṃ ca prāpya na prahṛṣyen na codvijet |
GE07bhg4c05u:774: kutaḥ ? sthirā svātmani buddhir yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:775: asaṃmūḍho 'nityena dehena nityam ātmānam ekīkṛtya mohaṃ na labdhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:780: bāhya-sparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham |
GE07bhg4c05u:782: śrīdharaḥ : moha-nivṛttyā buddhi-sthairye hetum āha bāhya-sparśeṣv iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:785: ātmani antaḥ-karaṇe yad upaśamātmakaṃ sāttvikaṃ sukham tad vindati labhate |
GE07bhg4c05u:786: sa copaśamaṃ sukhaṃ labdhvā brahmaṇi yogena samādhinā yuktas tadaikyaṃ prāpta ātmā yasya so 'kṣayaṃ sukham aśnute prāpnoti ||21||
GE07bhg4c05u:788: nanu bāhya-viṣaya-prīter aneka-janmānubhūtatvenātipracalatvāt tad-āsakta-cittasya katham alaukike brahmaṇi dṛṣṭa-sarva-sukha-rahite sthitiḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:793: dṛṣṭānandābhilāṣaṃ sa na mandīkartum apy alam || iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:797: teṣv asaktātmānāsakta-cittas tṛṣṇā-śūnyatayā viraktaḥ sann ātmani antaḥ-karaṇa eva bāhya-viṣaya-nirapekṣaṃ yad upaśamātmakaṃ sukhaṃ tad vindati labhate nirmala-sattva-vṛttyā |
GE07bhg4c05u:799: yac ca kāma-sukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham |
GE07bhg4c05u:801: athavā pratyag-ātmani tvaṃ-padārthe yat sukhaṃ svarūpa-bhūtaṃ suṣuptāv anubhūyamānaṃ bāhya-viṣayāsakti-pratibandhād alambhamānaṃ tad eva tad-abhāvāl labhate |
GE07bhg4c05u:802_0: na kevalaṃ tvaṃ-padārtha-sukham eva labhate kintu tat-padārthaikyānubhavena pūrṇa-sukham
GE07bhg4c05u:802_1: apīty āha sa tṛṣṇā-śūnyo brahmaṇi paramātmani yogaḥ samādhis tena yuktas tasmin vyāpṛta
GE07bhg4c05u:803: athavā brahmaṇi tat-padārthe yogena vākyārthānubhava-rūpeṇa samādhinā yukta aikyaṃ prāpta ātmā tvaṃ-padārtha-svarūpaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c05u:804: sukham akṣayam anantaṃ sva-svarūpa-bhūtam aśnute vyāpnoti sukhānubhava-rūpa eva sarvadā bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:806_0: tasmād ātmany akṣaya-sukhānubhavārthī san bāhya-viṣaya-prīteḥ kṣaṇikāyā mahā-narakānubandhinyāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:806_1: sakāśād indriyāṇi nivartayet tāvataiva ca brahmaṇi sthitir bhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ ||21 ||
GE07bhg4c05u:807: viśvanāthaḥ : sa ca bāhya-sparśeṣu viṣaya-sukheṣv asaktātmā anāsakta-manāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:808: tatra hetur ātmani jīvātmani paramātmānaṃ vindati sati prāpte yat sukhaṃ tad akṣayaṃ sukham |
GE07bhg4c05u:809: sa evāśnute prāpnoti, na hi nirantaram amṛtāsvādine mṛttikā rocata iti bhāvaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c05u:810: baladevaḥ : paurvauttaryeṇa sva-parātmānāv anubhavatīty āha bāhyeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:811: bāhya-sparśeṣu śabdādi-viṣayānubhaveṣu asaktātmā san yadātmani sva-svarūpe 'nubhūyamāne sukham tadādau vindati,
GE07bhg4c05u:812: tad uttaraṃ brahmaṇi paramātmani yogaḥ samādhis tad-yuktātmā san yad akṣayaṃ mahad-anubhava-lakṣaṇaṃ sukham tad aśnute labhate ||21||
GE07bhg4c05u:815: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkha-yonaya eva te |
GE07bhg4c05u:816: ādy-anta-vantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c05u:817: śrīdharaḥ : nanu priya-viṣaya-bhogānām api nivṛtteḥ kathaṃ mokṣaḥ puruṣārthaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:819: saṃsparśā viṣayās tebhyo jātā ye bhogāḥ sukhāni |
GE07bhg4c05u:820: te hi vartamāna-kāle 'pi spardhāsūyādi-vyāptatvād duḥkhasyaiva yonayaḥ kāraṇa-bhūtāḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:824_0: nanu bāhya-viṣaya-prīti-nivṛttāv ātmany akṣaya-sukhānubhavas tasmiṃś ca sati tat-prasādād
GE07bhg4c05u:824_1: eva bāhya-viṣaya-prīti-nivṛttir itītaretarāśraya-vaśān naikam api sidhyed ity āśaṅkya
GE07bhg4c05u:824_2: viṣaya-doṣa-darśanābhyāsenaiva tat-prīti-nivṛttir bhavatīti parihāram āha ye hīti |

GE07bhg4c05u:837_2: sarvam api bhoga-sādhanaṃ kāla-traye 'pi kleśānubiddhatvād duḥkhaṃ na mūḍhasya bahuvidha-duḥkha-sahiṣṇor ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:841: tatra pariṇāmaś ca tāpaś ca saṃskāraś ca ta eva duḥkhāni tair ity arthaḥ |

GE07bhg4c05u:844: na hi tatra na rajyati tena sukhī ceti sambhavati |
GE07bhg4c05u:845: rāga eva ca pūrvam udbhūtaḥ san viṣaya-prāptyā sukha-rūpeṇa pariṇamate |
GE07bhg4c05u:847: yā hi bhogeṣv indriyāṇām upaśāntiḥ paritṛptatvāt tat sukham |
GE07bhg4c05u:849: na cendriyāṇāṃ bhogābhyāsena vaitṛṣṇyaṃ kartuṃ śakyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:850: yato bhogābhyāsam anu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni cendriyāṇāṃ | smṛtiś ca -

GE07bhg4c05u:855: nānupahatya bhūtāny upabhogaḥ sambhavatīti bhūtāni ca hinasti |

GE07bhg4c05u:858: ataḥ sukhānubhava-kāle 'pi tat-paripanthinaṃ prati dveṣasya sarvadaivāvasthitatvāt tāpa-duḥkhaṃ duṣparihāram eva |
GE07bhg4c05u:860: evaṃ duḥkha-sādhanāni parihartum aśakto muhyati ceti moha-duḥkhatāpi vyākhyeyā |
GE07bhg4c05u:861: tathā coktaṃ yoga-bhāṣya-kāraiḥ - sarvasya dveṣānubiddhaś cetanācetana-sādhanādhīnas tāpānubhava iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:863: sukha-sādhanāni ca prārthayamānaḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca parispandate |
GE07bhg4c05u:864: tataḥ param anugṛṇāty upahanti ceti parānuraha-pīḍābhyāṃ dharmādharmāv

GE07bhg4c05u:879: yasmāc calaṃ ca guṇa-vṛttam iti kṣipra-pariṇāmi cittam uktam |

GE07bhg4c05u:901_1: madhv-amṛtāvayava-nirmiteva candraṃ bhittvā niḥsṛteva jñāyate nīlotpala-patrāyatākṣī

GE07bhg4c05u:907: duḥkhe sukha-khyātir udāhṛtā pariṇāma-tāpa-saṃskāra-duḥkhair guṇa-vṛtti-virodhāc ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekina iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:908: anātmany ātma-khyātir yathā śarīre manuṣyo 'ham ity ādiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:909: iyaṃ cāvidyā sarva-kleśa-mūla-bhūtā tama ity ucyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:911: sādhana-rahitasyāpi sarvaṃ sukha-jātīyaṃ me bhūyād iti viparyaya-viśeṣo rāgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:913: duḥkha-sādhane vidyamāne 'pi kim api duḥkham me mā bhūd iti viparyaya-viśeṣo dveṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:915: āyur-abhāve 'py etaiḥ śarīrendriyādibhir anityair api viyogo me mā bhūd ity āvidvad-aṅganā-bālaṃ svābhāvikaḥ sarva-prāṇi-sādhāraṇo maraṇa-trāsa-rūpo viparyaya-viśeṣo 'bhiniveśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:918: tamo moho mahā-mohas tāmisro hy andha-saṃjñitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:920: ete ca kleśāś catur avasthā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:925: etādṛg avasthā-catuṣṭaya-viśiṣṭānām asmitādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ viparyaya-rūpāṇāṃ kleśānām avidyaiva sāmānya-rūpā kṣetraṃ prasava-bhūmiḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:928: te ca kleśāḥ prasuptā yathā prakṛti-līnānāṃ, tanavaḥ pratipakṣa-bhāvanayā tanūkṛtā yathā yoginām |
GE07bhg4c05u:929: ta ubhaye 'pi sūkṣmāḥ pratiprasavena mano-nirodhenaiva nirbīja-samādhinā heyāḥ |

GE07bhg4c05u:932: yathā rāga-kāle krodho vidyamāno 'pi na prādurbhūta iti vicchinna ucyate |

GE07bhg4c05u:938: udāratā tu kadācit kasyacid iti viśeṣaḥ |

GE07bhg4c05u:942: sa ca karmāśaya iha paratra ca sva-vipākārambhakatvena dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-janma-vedanīyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:944: ataḥ samīcīnam uktaṃ ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkha-yonaya eva te ādyantavanta iti |

GE07bhg4c05u:950: na saṃsāre sukhasya gandha-mātram apy astīti buddhvā tataḥ sarvāṇīndriyāṇi nivartayed ity arthaḥ ||22||

GE07bhg4c05u:958: kāma-krodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ ||23||

GE07bhg4c05u:961: atas tat-sahana-samartha eva mokṣa-bhāg ity āha śaknotīti |
GE07bhg4c05u:962: kāmāt kordhāc codbhavati yo vego mano-netrādi-kṣobhādi-lakṣaṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:963: tam ihaiva tad-uttara-samaya eva yo naraḥ soḍhuṃ pratiroddhuṃ śaknoti, tad api na kṣaṇa-mātram |
GE07bhg4c05u:964: kintu śarīra-vimokṣaṇāt prāk, yāvad-deha-pātam ity arthaḥ |

GE07bhg4c05u:981_2: majjayati cādho mahā-narakān nayati ceti vega-pada-prayogeṇa sūcitam |

GE07bhg4c05u:987: tad-itaras tv āhāra-nidrā-bhaya-maithunādi-paśu-dharma-mātra-ratatvena manuṣyākāraḥ paśur eveti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:988: ā-śarīra-vimokṣaṇād ity atrānyad vyākhyānam - yathā maraṇād ūrdhvaṃ vilapantībhir yuvatībhir āliṅgyamāno 'pi putrādibhir dahyamāno 'pi prāṇa-śūnyatvāt kāma-krodha-vegaṃ sahate,

GE07bhg4c05u:1002: śrīdhara : na kevalaṃ kāma-krodha-vega-saṃharaṇa-mātreṇa mokṣaṃ prāpnoti |

GE07bhg4c05u:1012_1: ārāma āramaṇaṃ krīḍā yasya so 'ntar-ārāmas tyakta-sarva-parigrahatvena bāhya-sukha-sādhana-śūnya ity arthaḥ |

GE07bhg4c05u:1014: yathāntar eva sukhaṃ na bāhyair viṣayais tathāntar evātmani jyotir vijñānaṃ na bāhyair indriyair yasya so 'ntar-jyotiḥ śrotrādi-janya-śabdādi-viṣaya-vijñāna-rahitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1016: samādhi-kāle śabdādi-pratibhāsābhāvād vyutthāna-kāle tat-pratibhāse 'pi mithyātva-niścayān na bāhya-viṣayais tasya sukhotpatti-sambhava ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1017: ya evaṃ yathokta-viśeṣaṇa-sampannaḥ sa yogī samāhito brahma-nirvāṇaṃ brahma paramānanda-rūpaṃ kalpita-dvaitopaśama-rūpatvena nirvāṇaṃ tad eva,
GE07bhg4c05u:1021: brahmaiva san brahmāpy eti iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1022: avasthiter iti kāśa-kṛtsnaḥ iti nyāyāc ca ||24||
GE07bhg4c05u:1023: viśvanātha - yas tu saṃsārātītas tasya tu brahmānubhava eva sukham ity āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1025: yato 'ntarātmany eva ramate, ato 'ntarātmany eva jyotir dṛṣṭir yasya saḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c05u:1026: baladeva - yat prītyā taṃ soḍhuṃ śaktas tad āha yo 'ntar iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1027: antarvartinānubhūtenātmanā sukhaṃ yasya saḥ, tenaivārāmaḥ krīḍā yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1028: tasminn eva jyotir dṛṣṭir yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1029: īdṛśo yogī niṣkāma-karmī brahma-bhūto labdha-śuddha-jaiva-svarūpo brahmādhigacchati paramātmānaṃ labhate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1040: madhusūdanaḥ : mukti-hetor jñānasya sādhanāntarāṇi vivṛṇvann āha labhanta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1045: etādṛśāś ca dvaitādarśitvena sarva-bhūta-hite ratā hiṃsā-śūnyā brahma-vido brahma-nirvāṇaṃ labhante |
GE07bhg4c05u:1047: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvam anupaśyataḥ || iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1048: bahu-vacanam, tad yo devānāṃ ity ādi-śruty-uktāniyama-pradarśanārtham ||25||
GE07bhg4c05u:1049: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ bahava eva sādhana-siddhā bhavantīty āha labhanta iti ||25||
GE07bhg4c05u:1050: baladevaḥ : evaṃ sādhana-siddhā bahava bhavantīty āha labhanta iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1061: saṃyata-cittānāṃ jñātātma-tattvānām abhita ubhayato jīvatāṃ mṛtānāṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c05u:1062: na dehānta eva teṣāṃ brahmaṇi layaḥ, api tu jīvatām api vartata ity arthaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c05u:1064: pūrvaṃ kāma-krodhayor utpannayor api vegaḥ soḍhavya ity uktam adhunā tu tayor utpatti-pratibandha eva kartavya ity āha kāmeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1065: kāma-krodhayor viyogas tad-anutpattir eva tad-yuktānāṃ kāma-krodha-viyuktānām |
GE07bhg4c05u:1066_0: ataeva yata-cetasāṃ saṃyata-cittānāṃ yatīnāṃ yatna-śīlānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ viditātmanāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1066_1: sākṣāt-kṛta-paramātmanām abhita ubhayato jīvatāṃ mṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ brahma-nirvāṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1069: jñātas tvaṃ-padārtha-nāma-prāpta-paramātma-jñānānāṃ kiyatā kālena brahma-nirvāṇa-sukhaṃ syād ity apekṣāyām āha kāmeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1071: abhitaḥ sarvato-bhāvenaiva vartata eveti brahma-nirvāṇe tasya naivātivilambam iti bhāvaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c05u:1072: baladevaḥ : īdṛśān paramātmāpy anuvartata ity āha kāmeti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1073: yatīnāṃ prayatnavatāṃ tān abhito brahma vartata ity arthaḥ | yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c05u:1075: svāny apatyāni puṣṇanti tathāham api padmaja || iti ||26||
GE07bhg4c05u:1078: sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1081: vigatecchā-bhaya-krodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ ||28||
GE07bhg4c05u:1082: śrīdharaḥ : sa yogī brahma-nirvāṇam ity ādiṣu yogī mokṣam avāpnotīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1083: tam eva yogaṃ saṅkṣepeṇāha sparśān iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c05u:1084: bāhyā eva sparśā rūpa-rasādayo viṣayāś cintitāḥ santo 'ntaḥ praviśanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1086: cakṣur bhruvor antare bhrū-madhya eva kṛtvātyantaṃ netrayor nimīlane hi nidrayā mano līyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1088: tad-ubhaya-doṣa-parihārārtham ardha-nimīlanena bhrū-madhye dṛṣṭiṃ nidhāyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1089: ucchvāsa-niḥśvāsa-rūpeṇa nāsikayor abhyantare carantau prāṇāpānāv ūrdhvādho-gati-rodhena samau kṛtvā,
GE07bhg4c05u:1091: yad vā prāṇo 'yaṃ yathā na bhair niryāti yathā cāpāno 'ntar na praviśati,
GE07bhg4c05u:1092: kintu nāsā-madhya eva dvāv api yathā caratas tathā mandābhyām ucchvāsa-niḥśvāsābhyāṃ samau
GE07bhg4c05u:1096: mokṣa eva param ayanaṃ prāpyaṃ yasya |
GE07bhg4c05u:1098: evaṃbhūto yo muniḥ sa sadā jīvann api mukta evety arthaḥ ||27-28||
GE07bhg4c05u:1100: pūrvam īśvarārpita-sarva-bhāvasya karma-yogenāntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhis tataḥ sarva-karma-saṃnyāsas tataḥ śravaṇādi-parasya tattva-jñānaṃ mokṣa-sādhanam udetīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1101: adhunā sa yogī brahma-nirvāṇam ity atra sūcitaṃ dhyāna-yogaṃ samyag-darśana-syāntaraṅga-sādhanaṃ vistareṇa vaktuṃ sūtra-sthānīyāṃs trīn ślokān āha bhagavān |
GE07bhg4c05u:1102: eteṣām eva vṛtti-sthānīyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyo bhaviṣyati |
GE07bhg4c05u:1104: tṛtīyena tu tat-phalaṃ paramātma-jñānam iti vivekaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1105_0: sparśān śabdādīn bāhyān bahir bhavān api śrotrādi-dvārā tat-tad-ākārāntaḥ-karaṇa-vṛttibhir
GE07bhg4c05u:1105_1: antaḥ-praviṣṭān punar bahir eva kṛtvā para-vairāgya-vaśena tat-tad-ākārāṃ vṛttim
GE07bhg4c05u:1106: yady eta āntarā bhaveyus tadopāya-sahasreṇāpi bahir na syuḥ svabhāva-bhaṅga-prasaṅgāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:1107: bāhyānāṃ tu rāga-vaśād antaḥ-praviṣṭānāṃ vairāgyeṇa bahir gamanaṃ sambhavatīti vadituṃ bāhyān iti viśeṣaṇam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1108: tad anena vairāgyam uktvābhyāsam āha cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ kṛtvety anuṣajyate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1109: atyanta-nimīlane hi nidrākhyā layātmikā vṛttir ekā bhavet |
GE07bhg4c05u:1110: prasāreṇa tu pramāṇa-viparyaya-viveka-vikalpa-smṛtayaś catasro vikṣepātmikā vṛttayo bhaveyuḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1111: pañcāpi tu vṛttayo niroddhavyā iti ardha-nimīlanena bhrū-madhye cakṣuṣo nidhānam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1114: anenopāyena yatāḥ saṃyatā indriya-mano-buddhayo yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c05u:1116: vigatecchā-bhaya-krodha iti vīrta-rāga-bhaya-krodha ity atra vyākhyātam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1117: etādṛśo yaḥ saṃnyāsī sadā bhavati mukta eva saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1119: athavā ya etādṛśaḥ sa sadā jīvann api mukta eva ||27-28||
GE07bhg4c05u:1124: idānīṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogena śuddhāntaḥkaraṇasyāṣṭāṅga-yogaṃ brahmānubhava-sādhanaṃ jñāna-yogād apy utkṛṣṭatvena ṣaṣṭhādhyāye vaktuṃ tat-sūtra-rūpaṃ śloka-trayam āha sparśān iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1127: tasmān manasaḥ sakāśād bahiṣkṛtya viṣayebhyo manaḥ pratyāhṛtyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1128: cakṣuṣī ca bhruvor antare madhye kṭvā netrayoḥ sampūrṇa-nimīlane nidrayā mano līyata unmīlanena bahiḥ prasarati |
GE07bhg4c05u:1130: bhrū-madhye dṛṣṭiṃ nidhāyocchvāsa-niśvāsa-rūpeṇa nāsikayor abhyantare carantau prāṇāpānāv ūrdhvādho-gati-nirodhena samau kṛtvā |
GE07bhg4c05u:1133: atha karmaṇā niṣkāmeṇa viśuddha-manāḥ samuditātma-jñānas tad-darśanāya samādhiṃ kuryād iti sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ sūcayann āha sparśān iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1134: sparśā śabdādayo viṣayās te bāhyā eva smṛtāḥ santo manasi praviśanti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1135: tāṃs tat-smṛti-parityāgena bahiṣkṛtya viṣayebhyo manaḥ pratyāhṛtyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1136: bhruvor antare madhye cakṣuś ca kṭvā netrayoḥ saṃnimīlane nidrayā manaso layaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1137: pronmīlane ca bahis tasya prasāraḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:1139: tathā nāsābhyantara-cāriṇau prāṇāpānāv ūrdhvādho-gati-nirodhena samau tulyau kṛtvā kumbhayitvety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1140: etenopāyena yatā ātmāvalokanāya sthāpitā indriyādayo yena saḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1143: | īdṛśo yaḥ sarvadā phala-kālavat sādhana-kāle 'pi mukta eva ||27-28||
GE07bhg4c05u:1147: suhṛdaṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati ||29||
GE07bhg4c05u:1148: śrīdharaḥ : nanv evam indriyādi-saṃyamana-mātreṇa kathaṃ muktiḥ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c05u:1149: na tan-mātreṇa, kintu jñāna-dvāreṇety āha bhoktāram iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1150: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva mama bhaktaiḥ samarpitānāṃ yadṛcchayā bhoktāraṃ pālakam iti vā |
GE07bhg4c05u:1153: antaryāmiṇaṃ māṃ jñātvā mat-prasādena śāntiṃ mokṣam ṛcchati prāpnoti ||29||
GE07bhg4c05u:1155: samuccayaḥ krameṇoktaḥ sarvajñaṃ naumi taṃ harim ||
GE07bhg4c05u:1159: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ yoga-yuktaḥ kiṃ jñātvā mucyata iti tadāha bhoktāram iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1160: sarveṣāṃ yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ ca kartṛ-rūpeṇa devatā-rūpeṇa ca bhoktāraṃ bhoga-kartāraṃ pālakam iti vā |
GE07bhg4c05u:1162: sarveṣāṃ lokānāṃ mahāntam īśvaraṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnām api niyantāram |
GE07bhg4c05u:1163_0: sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ suhṛdaṃ pratyupakāra-nirapekṣatayopakāriṇaṃ sarvāntgaryāmiṇaṃ sarva-bhāsakaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1163_1: paripūrṇa-sac-cid-ānanadaika-rasaṃ paramārtha-satyaṃ sarvātmānaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ māṃ jñātvātmatvena
GE07bhg4c05u:1163_2: sākṣātkṛtya śāntiṃ sarva-saṃsāroparatiṃ muktim ṛcchati prāpnotīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c05u:1164: tvāṃ paśyann api kathaṃ nāhaṃ mukta ity āśaṅkyānirākaraṇāya viśeṣaṇāni |
GE07bhg4c05u:1165: ukta-rūpeṇaiva mama jñānaṃ mukti-kāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ ||29||
GE07bhg4c05u:1171: evambhūtasya yogino 'pi jñānina iva bhakty-utthena paramātma-jñānenaiva mokṣa ity āha bhoktāram iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1172: yajñānāṃ karmi-kṛtānāṃ tapasāṃ ca jñāni-kṛtānāṃ bhoktāraṃ pālayitāram iti karmiṇāṃ jñānināṃ copāsyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1173: sarva-lokānāṃ maheśvaraṃ mahā-niyantāram antaryāminaṃ yoginām upāsyam |
GE07bhg4c05u:1174_0: sarva-bhūtānāṃ suhṛdaṃ kṛpayā sva-bhakta-dvārā sva-bhakty-upadeśena hita-kāriṇam
GE07bhg4c05u:1174_1: iti bhaktānām upāsyaṃ māṃ jñātveti sattva-guṇa-maya-jñānena nirguṇasya mamānubhavāsambhavāt
GE07bhg4c05u:1175: nirguṇayā bhaktyaiva yogī svopāsyaṃ paramātmānaṃ mām aparokṣānubhava-gocarīkṛtya śāntiṃ mokṣam ṛcchati prāpnoti ||29||
GE07bhg4c05u:1181: evaṃ samādhi-sthaḥ kṛta-svātmāvalokanaḥ paramātmānam upāsyam ucyata ity āha bhoktāram iti |
GE07bhg4c05u:1184: tam īśvarāṇāṃ paramaṃ maheśvaraṃ [ŚvetU 6.7] ity ādi śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c05u:1186: īdṛśaṃ māṃ jñātvā svārādhyatayānubhūya śāntiṃ saṃsāra-nivṛttim ṛcchati labhate |
GE07bhg4c05u:1187: sarveśvarasya suhṛdaś ca samārādhanaṃ khalu sukhāvahaṃ sukha-sādhanam iti ||29||
